Module.Content: <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://hackathon-jp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/OpenSocial20090424/ToDo/trunk/assets/css/todo.css" /> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://jqueryjs.googlecode.com/files/jquery-1.3.2.min.js" ></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://test.ngsdev.org/jopensocial/src/jopensocial.js" ></script> <script type="text/javascript">$j = jQuery.noConflict();</script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://hackathon-jp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/OpenSocial20090424/ToDo/trunk/assets/js/libs/prototype.js?a=2"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://hackathon-jp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/OpenSocial20090424/ToDo/trunk/assets/js/libs/effects.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://hackathon-jp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/OpenSocial20090424/ToDo/trunk/assets/js/libs/dragdrop.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://hackathon-jp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/OpenSocial20090424/ToDo/trunk/assets/js/todo.ui.js" ></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://hackathon-jp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/OpenSocial20090424/ToDo/trunk/assets/js/todo.data.js" ></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://hackathon-jp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/OpenSocial20090424/ToDo/trunk/assets/js/todo.js" ></script> <script type="text/javascript"> document.write(ToDoApp.getHTML()); </script>
